channel.title: Ingame Admin Or Mod Services
channel.description:
Hello
First of all, I do not want to be branded as a beggar requesting mod/admin to feel cool or get free items or get more commands(If I wanted any of those I would just play on my own server). I just have spair time and would like to help people who get alot of players regularly and need a good admin or mod to keep other players in order. When I am using a mod or admin account I do not muck around, I stand by anything I am told by the boss. I will help new players with commands or problems with items or clients, I will make sure players abide by rules and don't break them. So basically if anyone needs a mod or admin to enforce rules to all players on their server then I am up for it. Also I would like to have more people recommend/vouch me for jobs like this. :)
Thanks, Locksta -------------------- I'm Admin on jc-scape.servegame.com(Silab)(Known as X Love X) I'm Owner of aussie-scape.no-ip.org(Frugooscape)(Known as Locksta and x Admin x) I am usually going by the name of X Love X when playing on anyone elses server. My real life name is Sarah so call me by that if you wish.

item.title: Ingame Admin Or Mod Services
item.dc:creator: @King_Tom King Tom
item.description:
@King_Tom wrote:

I would love you to become a Moderator on my server please. Just help me get it online. Look in my topic in the Help/Development section.

Read full topic

item.title: Ingame Admin Or Mod Services
item.dc:creator: @Locksta Locksta
item.description:
@Locksta wrote:

Hello

First of all, I do not want to be branded as a beggar requesting mod/admin to feel cool or get free items or get more commands(If I wanted any of those I would just play on my own server).
I just have spair time and would like to help people who get alot of players regularly and need a good admin or mod to keep other players in order. When I am using a mod or admin account I do not muck around, I stand by anything I am told by the boss. So basically if anyone needs a mod or admin to enforce rules to all players on their server then I am up for it. Also I would like to have more people recommend/vouch me for jobs like this.

Thanks,
Locksta
